title: random dc in game. server problems???

embed.description: Tinypic™ is a photo and video sharing service that allows you to easily upload, link and share your images and videos on MySpace®, eBay®, blogs and message boards. No account required, upload your photos and videos today!

body: 4 players in a aram game just now continually dc'd (on opposite teams) including me. im never over 50 ping au and my internet was just fine when alt tabbing

replies.body: still waiting i cant log in....

In another discussion where we're experiencing the same thing we all have iPrimus or Dodo. Dodo was bought out by iPrimus (M2 Group) so tthey likely use the same network etc now, or have the same protocols on each network.

If you're using one of these, call them tomorrow on 1300 85 11 85.

others of us are so if we flood them with not happy messages they might put things back the way they were :)
